message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $20,000.  I believe in its value and think it would be a great asset to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $17,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $17,000 is too low. How about we meet in the middle at $18,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I understand your position and would like to propose $18,000 as a compromise. I hope this offer meets somewhere in the middle for you.
